title: Oregon Considers Ban On Declawing Cats
teaser: Some cat lovers worry the declawing bill has too many exceptions, and are calling for lawmakers to start over again.
contentencoded:
Oregon could become the first state in the nation to ban the declawing of cats in most circumstances. Some cat lovers worry the bill moving through the legislature has too many exceptions. They want lawmakers to start over again – from scratch. From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Chris Lehman of Northwest News Network reports.

  • Read more on this story via Northwest News Network

Reporter

  • Chris Lehman, Salem correspondent for public radio’s Northwest News Network. He tweets @CapitolCurrents.
